CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Phone),'',SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE(Phone,'(',''), ')',''), ' ',''), '-',''))&' '& IF(ISBLANK(MobilePhone),'',SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE(MobilePhone,'(',''), ')',''), ' ',''), '-',''))&' '& IF(ISBLANK(PPR_Contact_Phone__c),'',SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE(PPR_Contact_Phone__c,'(',''), ')',''), ' ',''), '-',''))
CustomField.label: Phone clean
